Developing a modular, prefabricated housing system that can be quickly and easily deployed to address homelessness.
Implementing a city-wide rental subsidy program to provide affordable housing options for homeless individuals and families.
Creating a network of safe, temporary shelters that can be easily scaled up or down as needed to address fluctuations in homelessness.
Establishing a job training and placement program to help homeless individuals gain the skills and connections they need to secure employment and become self-sufficient.

Developing a comprehensive support services program that provides mental health, substance abuse, and other services to help homeless individuals address the root causes of their homelessness and improve their overall well-being.
